title: SEMICONDUCTOR WAFER STORAGE KIOSK
abstract: A semiconductor wafer cassette storage cabinet or stocker (10) having retrieval and transfer system constructed in the form of a kiosk encircling a pick-up and transfer apparatus. The structure is fo rmed of a plurality of identical sections (12) having walls and a roofjoined together to form a nearly semi-circular enclosure aroundt he pick-up and transfer apparatus. Each section has multiple level input/output ports adjacent to each other with a shelf (26,28) for supporting a semiconductor wafer cassette (16). Shelves (26,28) at the input/ouput ports are constructed of rails (30,32) supporting drive rollers (36) and a photo-detector (40) to activate the drive rollers to fill an output port whenever a casstte has been retrieved and transferred.

motivations: There is a need for efficient storage and retrieval systems for semiconductor wafers to streamline manufacturing processes.
objectives: Design a semiconductor wafer storage kiosk that enables efficient retrieval and transfer of wafer cassettes.
methods: Develop a modular, semi-circular enclosure with multiple level input/output ports and shelves for supporting wafer cassettes.
Implement a pick-up and transfer apparatus with automated drive rollers and photo-detectors for cassette retrieval and transfer.
results: Improve the efficiency and organization of semiconductor wafer storage and retrieval processes.
llama_json.research_subject: Design of a semiconductor wafer storage kiosk with automated retrieval and transfer system

motivations: There is a need for an efficient system for storing and retrieving semiconductor wafer cassettes.
objectives: Design a semiconductor wafer cassette storage cabinet or stocker with a retrieval and transfer system in the form of a kiosk.
methods: Construct the structure from identical sections forming a nearly semi-circular enclosure around the pick-up and transfer apparatus.
Equip each section with multiple level input/output ports with shelves for supporting a semiconductor wafer cassette.
Implement drive rollers and a photo-detector to activate the drive rollers to fill an output port whenever a cassette has been retrieved and transferred.
results: Provide an efficient system for storing and retrieving semiconductor wafer cassettes.
openai_json.research_subject: Semiconductor wafer storage kiosk design and implementation

motivations: There is a need for efficient storage and retrieval systems for semiconductor wafer cassettes in manufacturing environments.
Current storage solutions may lack automated transfer capabilities and optimal space utilization for semiconductor wafer handling.
objectives: Design and develop a semiconductor wafer cassette storage cabinet with integrated automated retrieval and transfer capabilities.
Create a modular kiosk structure that optimizes space utilization while providing multiple input/output ports for wafer cassette handling.
methods: Construct a semi-circular kiosk enclosure using identical modular sections around a central pick-up and transfer apparatus.
Implement shelves with drive rollers and photo-detectors for automated cassette movement and detection.
Design multiple level input/output ports with rail-supported shelves for cassette storage and retrieval.
results: Automated semiconductor wafer cassette storage system with efficient retrieval and transfer capabilities.
Improved space utilization and workflow efficiency in semiconductor manufacturing environments through modular kiosk design.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Automated semiconductor wafer cassette storage and retrieval system
